description.zh-cn: 唐朝倒数第二位皇帝，唐懿宗第七子，唐僖宗的弟弟。在位期间试图削除藩镇与宦官势力，但最终反被军阀挟制，并被朱温所杀。
description.en: The penultimate emperor of the Tang dynasty, the seventh son of Emperor Yizong and younger brother of Emperor Xizong. During his reign, he attempted to eliminate the power of military governors (fanzhen) and eunuchs, but was ultimately controlled by warlords and killed by Zhu Wen.

description.zh-cn: 唐末藩镇，宣武军节度使，后成为势力最大的军阀。他控制了唐昭宗，将其迁都并杀害，最终篡夺唐朝政权，建立后梁。
description.en: A jiedushi of the late Tang dynasty who became the most powerful warlord. He controlled Emperor Zhaozong, forced the relocation of the capital, and eventually had him assassinated, ultimately usurping the Tang throne to establish the Later Liang.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，唐昭宗的父亲。
description.en: An emperor of the Tang dynasty, father of Emperor Zhaozong.

description.zh-cn: 唐懿宗的妃嫔，唐昭宗的生母，被追尊为皇后。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Yizong and the birth mother of Emperor Zhaozong, posthumously honored as Empress.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，唐昭宗的兄长。
description.en: An emperor of the Tang dynasty, older brother of Emperor Zhaozong.

description.zh-cn: 唐末掌权的宦官，拥立唐昭宗即位，后与昭宗决裂并被其讨伐。
description.en: A powerful eunuch in the late Tang dynasty who enthroned Emperor Zhaozong, but later broke with him and was campaigned against.

description.zh-cn: 唐末河东节度使，沙陀族首领。唐昭宗曾试图讨伐他但反被打败。
description.en: The jiedushi of Hedong circuit during the late Tang dynasty and a Shatuo chieftain. Emperor Zhaozong attempted to campaign against him but was defeated.

description.zh-cn: 唐末凤翔节度使，曾与朝廷发生冲突，兵临长安，后又与昭宗和解。
description.en: The jiedushi of Fengxiang circuit during the late Tang dynasty. He clashed with the imperial court, marched on Chang'an, and later reconciled with Emperor Zhaozong.

description.zh-cn: 唐末镇国节度使，曾在唐昭宗出逃时将其控制于华州，并杀害了多名宗室诸王。
description.en: The jiedushi of Zhenguo circuit during the late Tang dynasty. He held Emperor Zhaozong under his control in Huazhou when the emperor fled the capital and executed several imperial princes.

description.zh-cn: 唐末神策军左中尉，宦官。他发动政变废黜并软禁了唐昭宗，后在反政变中被杀。
description.en: A eunuch and Left Commander of the Shence Army in the late Tang dynasty. He launched a coup to depose and place Emperor Zhaozong under house arrest, but was later killed in a counter-coup.

description.zh-cn: 唐昭宗的皇后，唐哀帝李柷和德王李𥙿的母亲。在昭宗被弑时幸免于难。
description.en: Empress consort of Emperor Zhaozong, and the mother of Emperor Ai and Prince of De, Li Yu. She survived the assassination of Emperor Zhaozong.

description.zh-cn: 唐昭宗长子。曾被宦官刘季述拥立为帝，后被朱温所杀。
description.en: The eldest son of Emperor Zhaozong. He was briefly enthroned by the eunuch Liu Jishu and was later executed by Zhu Wen.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝末代皇帝，唐昭宗第九子。在昭宗被杀后，被朱温拥立为傀儡皇帝。
description.en: The last emperor of the Tang dynasty, the ninth son of Emperor Zhaozong. He was installed as a puppet emperor by Zhu Wen after his father's assassination.

description.zh-cn: 唐昭宗朝宰相，试图联合朱温势力来铲除宦官，但最终被朱温所杀。
description.en: A chancellor during Emperor Zhaozong's reign. He attempted to use Zhu Wen's power to eliminate the eunuchs but was ultimately killed by Zhu Wen.

description.zh-cn: 忠于唐昭宗的神策军军官，在宰相崔胤指使下发动反政变，诛杀刘季述，使昭宗复辟。
description.en: An officer of the Shence Army loyal to Emperor Zhaozong. At the instigation of Chancellor Cui Yin, he launched a counter-coup, killed Liu Jishu, and restored Emperor Zhaozong to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 朱温的部将，左龙武统军。受朱温指派，率兵执行了弑杀唐昭宗的行动。
description.en: A general under Zhu Wen, Left Longwu Army Commander. He was dispatched by Zhu Wen to lead the troops that assassinated Emperor Zhaozong.

description.zh-cn: 朱温的部将，右龙武统军。受朱温指派，参与了弑杀唐昭宗的行动。
description.en: A general under Zhu Wen, Right Longwu Army Commander. He was dispatched by Zhu Wen and participated in the assassination of Emperor Zhaozong.

description.zh-cn: 朱温的心腹，被任为枢密使以监视唐昭宗，并参与了弑君行动。
description.en: A confidant of Zhu Wen, appointed as Commissioner of Palace Affairs to monitor Emperor Zhaozong, and participated in his assassination.

description.zh-cn: 龙武衙官，在弑君行动中追上并直接杀害了唐昭宗。
description.en: An officer of the Longwu Guard who, during the assassination, pursued and directly killed Emperor Zhaozong.

description.zh-cn: 唐昭宗的昭仪，在弑君行动中试图以身体保护昭宗，一同被杀害。
description.en: A Zhaoyi (a high-ranking consort) of Emperor Zhaozong. She attempted to shield the emperor with her body during the assassination and was killed alongside him.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，被认为是中国的黄金时代之一。唐昭宗是其晚期的皇帝。
description.en: An imperial dynasty of China, generally regarded as a high point in Chinese civilization. Emperor Zhaozong was one of its late rulers.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝中晚期的地方军事割据势力，拥有独立的军事、财政和行政权力，是导致唐朝衰亡的主要原因之一。
description.en: Regional military governorships in mid to late Tang China which possessed significant autonomy in military, financial, and administrative affairs, and were a primary cause of the dynasty's decline.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝晚期控制中央禁军、掌握朝政的重要政治势力。
description.en: A powerful political faction in the late Tang dynasty that controlled the imperial guards and held significant influence over the court.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝的首都。唐昭宗曾多次被迫离开此地。
description.en: The capital city of the Tang dynasty. Emperor Zhaozong was forced to leave the city multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝的东都。唐昭宗被朱温强迫迁都至此并最终在此被杀。
description.en: The eastern capital of the Tang dynasty. Emperor Zhaozong was forcibly relocated here by Zhu Wen and was ultimately assassinated in the city.

description.zh-cn: 唐昭宗是唐懿宗的第七子。
description.en: Emperor Zhaozong was the seventh son of Emperor Yizong.

description.zh-cn: 唐昭宗的生母是王氏，后被追尊为恭宪皇后。
description.en: Emperor Zhaozong's birth mother was Lady Wang, posthumously honored as Empress Gongxian.

description.zh-cn: 唐昭宗是唐僖宗的弟弟。
description.en: Emperor Zhaozong was the younger brother of Emperor Xizong.

description.zh-cn: 何氏是唐昭宗的皇后。
description.en: Lady He was the empress consort of Emperor Zhaozong.

description.zh-cn: 李𥙿是唐昭宗的长子。
description.en: Li Yu was the eldest son of Emperor Zhaozong.

description.zh-cn: 李𥙿是何皇后所生。
description.en: Li Yu was born to Empress He.

description.zh-cn: 唐哀帝李柷是唐昭宗的第九子。
description.en: Emperor Ai, Li Zhu, was the ninth son of Emperor Zhaozong.

description.zh-cn: 唐哀帝李柷是何皇后所生。
description.en: Emperor Ai, Li Zhu, was born to Empress He.

description.zh-cn: 唐僖宗死后，宦官杨复恭拥立唐昭宗（时为寿王李晔）为帝。
description.en: After Emperor Xizong's death, the eunuch Yang Fudong enthroned Emperor Zhaozong (then Prince of Shou, Li Ye).

description.zh-cn: 大顺二年（891年），唐昭宗下令逮捕杨复恭，杨复恭抵抗失败后出奔。
description.en: In 891, Emperor Zhaozong ordered the arrest of Yang Fudong, who fled after his resistance failed.

description.zh-cn: 唐昭宗曾下令讨伐河东节度使李克用，但反被李克用击败。
description.en: Emperor Zhaozong ordered a campaign against Li Keyong, the jiedushi of Hedong, but was defeated by him.

description.zh-cn: 凤翔节度使李茂贞因对朝廷人事任命不满，与盟友王行瑜兵临京城长安，迫使昭宗赐死宰相杜让能。
description.en: Dissatisfied with a court appointment, Li Maozhen, the jiedushi of Fengxiang, marched on the capital Chang'an with his ally Wang Xingyu, forcing Emperor Zhaozong to order the death of Chancellor Du Rangneng.

description.zh-cn: 唐昭宗为躲避李茂贞而逃至华州，但被镇国节度使韩建所控制，期间韩建还杀害了十一王。
description.en: Emperor Zhaozong fled to Huazhou to escape Li Maozhen but was held under the control of jiedushi Han Jian, who also killed eleven imperial princes during this time.

description.zh-cn: 光化三年（900年）十一月，宦官刘季述发动政变，逼迫唐昭宗禅位给太子李𥙿，并将昭宗与何皇后软禁。
description.en: In November 900, the eunuch Liu Jishu launched a coup, forcing Emperor Zhaozong to abdicate in favor of Crown Prince Li Yu and placing Zhaozong and Empress He under house arrest.

description.zh-cn: 在政变中，刘季述迎立皇太子李𥙿为皇帝。
description.en: During the coup, Liu Jishu installed Crown Prince Li Yu as the new emperor.

description.zh-cn: 天复元年（901年）正月，神策军军官孙德昭发动反政变，杀死了刘季述。
description.en: In January 901, Shence Army officer Sun Dezhao launched a counter-coup, killing Liu Jishu.

description.zh-cn: 孙德昭杀死刘季述后，迎请唐昭宗复位。
description.en: After killing Liu Jishu, Sun Dezhao restored Emperor Zhaozong to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 崔胤为对抗宦官势力，召朱温率军进入关中。
description.en: To counter the power of the eunuchs, Cui Yin summoned Zhu Wen to lead an army into the Guanzhong region.

description.zh-cn: 朱温察觉崔胤有对抗之心，遂逼迫昭宗罢免其相位并将其攻杀。
description.en: Sensing Cui Yin's intention to oppose him, Zhu Wen forced Emperor Zhaozong to dismiss the chancellor and then had him killed.

description.zh-cn: 为扫除称帝障碍，朱温派部将朱友恭、氏叔琮等人于天祐元年（904年）八月十一日夜间入宫弑杀唐昭宗。
description.en: To remove obstacles to his own enthronement, Zhu Wen dispatched his generals Zhu Yougong, Shi Shucong, and others to assassinate Emperor Zhaozong in the palace on the night of September 22, 904.

description.zh-cn: 朱友恭奉朱温之命，率兵闯入宫中执行了弑杀唐昭宗的行动。
description.en: Under Zhu Wen's orders, Zhu Yougong led soldiers into the palace and carried out the assassination of Emperor Zhaozong.

description.zh-cn: 氏叔琮奉朱温之命，参与了弑杀唐昭宗的行动。
description.en: Under Zhu Wen's orders, Shi Shucong participated in the assassination of Emperor Zhaozong.

description.zh-cn: 在弑君行动中，龙武衙官史太追上并直接杀害了正在逃跑的唐昭宗。
description.en: During the assassination, Longwu Guard officer Shi Tai pursued and directly killed the fleeing Emperor Zhaozong.

description.zh-cn: 昭仪李渐荣试图以身体保护唐昭宗，被史太一同杀害。
description.en: Zhaoyi Li Jianrong attempted to shield Emperor Zhaozong with her body and was killed by Shi Tai along with him.

description.zh-cn: 因厌恶曾被拥立为帝的德王李𥙿，朱温在天祐二年（905年）二月将其杀害。
description.en: Due to his dislike for the Prince of De, Li Yu, who had once been made emperor, Zhu Wen had him killed in February 905.

description.zh-cn: 朱温在杀害唐昭宗后，拥立其第九子李柷为帝，是为唐哀帝。
description.en: After assassinating Emperor Zhaozong, Zhu Wen installed his ninth son, Li Zhu, as the new emperor, who became Emperor Ai.

description.zh-cn: 朱温强迫唐昭宗及长安居民迁都洛阳，并拆毁长安城宫室建筑。
description.en: Zhu Wen forced Emperor Zhaozong and the residents of Chang'an to move to Luoyang, and demolished the palaces and buildings in Chang'an.
